about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Expand your visions with this charming peaceful immersion. Lay back and take in the beauty of these mesmerizing skies. Begin in a field of yellow flowers and spring growth. Next, appreciate the dream-like snowy day in the mountains. Finalize your experience with perched on a deck overlooking the alluring landscape of wetlands.

Purpose
Calming

Length
10:09

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

name: Exhale XR - Graceful Skies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
